trans-unit.source: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 提供像素格式转换功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>发出信号初始化已完成。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> 使用创建的对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>构造函数将自动初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> class should be used.
trans-unit.target: 格式之间的转换具有不同特征的 RGB 颜色空间<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>应使用类。

trans-unit.source: Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion.
trans-unit.target: 颜色空间之间的转换需要源颜色配置文件和目标域映射提供可靠的颜色转换颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The color profiles are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> or by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色配置文件由<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>参数<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用转换之后，将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与映像数据相关的元数据标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> instance if <c>destinationFormat</c> is an indexed format.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>destinationFormat</c> 为索引格式，则为新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> 使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将位图转换为可识别 Alpha 颜色的托盘化格式时，位图的 Alpha 通道阈值。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel threshold for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" />.
trans-unit.target: 该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 的 Alpha 通道阈值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold%2A> value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold%2A>值用于确定的不透明度级别将映射到转换后的格式完全透明的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 9.8 值意指小于 25 的 alpha 值与任何像素，将映射到透明的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 100 的值将映射不是完全不透明的透明颜色的所有像素。

trans-unit.source: The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black.
trans-unit.target: 目标调色板应提供透明的颜色;否则，透明颜色将接近零，通常黑色的一个。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 初始化开始。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必须之间执行属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>已初始化，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>与一组使用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 当前正被初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel format to convert the bitmap to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要将位图转换成的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于位图的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the palette to apply to the bitmap if the format is indexed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当索引格式时要应用于位图的调色板。

trans-unit.source: The destination palette to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于位图的目标调色板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You must set this property if you want to use an indexed pixel format for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用的索引的像素格式，则必须设置此属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap" /> 初始化结束。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls, as demonstrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 必须之间执行属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>已初始化，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>与一组使用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> property is an indexed format and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat" /> 属性为索引格式而 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The palette colors do not match the destination format.
trans-unit.target: 调色板颜色和目标格式不匹配。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit" /> method is called without first calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit" /> 方法，而无需先调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位图源。

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 位图源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将链接<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>到另一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>到<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>所需。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[How to： 链 BitmapSource 对象在一起](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md)有关链接的示例。

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source" /> 依赖项属性。
